subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Cloaked in white cloth, American Pharoah was paraded like a war hero at the racetrack where he began his path to horse racing immortality with a win in the Kentucky Derby.
snippet: Cloaked in white cloth, American Pharoah was paraded like a war hero at the racetrack where he began his path to horse racing immortality with a win in the Kentucky Derby.
